content: here is another one of my sets of patterns for the chelsea doll barbie s little sister i had fun making these dresses and headbands and these gals look great in any color of yarn i make my dress patterns in one piece and make every effort to make my instructions clear so that also a beginner could make these dresses you could make two of these dresses in an evening and each dress has a different hem edging have fun and i am always willing to help as i always stand behind my patterns blessings connie
